short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically refresh a specific web page based on user input.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Once you've added the extension, you can pin it to your toolbar. 
When you click on the extension, a popup window will appear with the following options:
Target Web Page URL:
Refresh Interval (in minutes):
You can customize both settings based on your preferences. 
After making your selections, click the "Start Refresh" button, and you'll never have to worry about manually refreshing the page again.
